snippet: Bolivia's President Evo Morales will run for re-election in October to press on with his promise of expanding social reforms in the Andean nation, the vice president of the ruling party said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Bolivia's President to Seek Third Term to Expand Social Reforms
headline.main: Bolivia's President to Seek Third Term to Expand Social Reforms

lead_paragraph: Bolivia's President Evo Morales will run for re-election in October to press on with his promise of expanding social reforms in the Andean nation, the vice president of the ruling party said on Monday.
